description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏的开国皇帝，曹操和武宣卞皇后的嫡长子。除军政以外，在文学上亦有成就，与其父曹操、其弟曹植并称“三曹”。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period, and the eldest surviving son of the warlord Cao Cao and Empress Wuxuan Bian. Besides his political and military achievements, he was also an accomplished poet and scholar, known as one of the 'Three Caos' along with his father Cao Cao and his younger brother Cao Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏政权的奠基者，曹丕之父。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han Dynasty, the founder of the Cao Wei regime, and the father of Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的继室，曹丕、曹彰、曹植、曹熊的生母。
description.en: The second wife of Cao Cao and the biological mother of Cao Pi, Cao Zhang, Cao Zhi, and Cao Xiong.

description.zh-cn: 曹操与武宣卞皇后所生三子，曹丕之弟，建安文学的代表人物之一。曾与曹丕争夺世子之位。
description.en: The third son of Cao Cao and Empress Wuxuan Bian, younger brother of Cao Pi, and a representative figure of Jian'an literature. He once competed with Cao Pi for the position of heir apparent.

description.zh-cn: 东汉最后一任皇帝，后禅位于曹丕。
description.en: The last emperor of the Eastern Han Dynasty, who later abdicated the throne to Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的政权之一，由曹丕建立。
description.en: One of the states during the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代，末代皇帝为汉献帝刘协。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty, whose last emperor was Emperor Xian, Liu Xie.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏重臣，九品中正制的创立者。
description.en: An important official of Cao Wei and the founder of the Nine-rank system.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏时期创立的官员选拔制度。
description.en: An official selection system established during the Cao Wei period.

description.zh-cn: 中国魏晋南北朝时期的世家大族门阀。
description.en: The powerful and aristocratic clans in China during the Wei, Jin, and Southern and Northern Dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期孙吴的建立者。曾向曹丕称臣，后与曹魏敌对。
description.en: The founder of the state of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period. He once submitted to Cao Pi as a vassal but later became hostile to Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕在位期间三次对孙吴发动的军事行动，均未成功。
description.en: Three unsuccessful military campaigns launched by Cao Pi against Sun Wu during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕的妻妾，魏明帝曹叡的生母。原为袁绍次子袁熙之妻，后因失宠被曹丕赐死。
description.en: A consort of Cao Pi and the biological mother of Emperor Ming of Wei, Cao Rui. Originally the wife of Yuan Shao's second son Yuan Xi, she was later ordered by Cao Pi to commit suicide after falling out of favor.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏第二位皇帝，曹丕与文昭甄皇后之子。
description.en: The second emperor of Cao Wei, son of Cao Pi and Empress Wenzhao Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室名将，曹操的堂弟。因早年拒绝借钱给曹丕而遭其记恨，在曹丕称帝后被下狱。
description.en: A famous general of the Cao Wei imperial clan and a cousin of Cao Cao. He was resented by Cao Pi for refusing to lend him money in his early years and was imprisoned after Cao Pi became emperor.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏官员，鲍信之子。为人刚正，因劝谏曹丕停止打猎等事，后被曹丕处死。
description.en: An official of Cao Wei and son of Bao Xin. Known for his upright character, he was executed by Cao Pi after admonishing him for activities such as hunting.

description.zh-cn: 由曹丕所著的文学作品集，其中《论文》是中国文学史上第一部有系统的文学批评专论作品。
description.en: A collection of literary works written by Cao Pi. Its section 'Lun Wen' (On Literature) is the first systematic work of literary criticism in Chinese literary history.

description.zh-cn: 东汉沛国下辖县，为曹丕的出生地。
description.en: A county under Pei Principality during the Eastern Han Dynasty, and the birthplace of Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏都城，曹丕的逝世地。
description.en: The capital city of Cao Wei and the place where Cao Pi died.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍次子，文昭甄皇后的前夫。
description.en: The second son of Yuan Shao and the former husband of Empress Wenzhao Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕是曹操的嫡长子（其兄曹昂早逝）。
description.en: Cao Pi was the eldest legitimate son of Cao Cao (his older brother Cao Ang died early).

description.zh-cn: 曹丕是武宣卞皇后的嫡长子。
description.en: Cao Pi was the eldest son of Empress Wuxuan Bian.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡是曹丕与文昭甄皇后所生之子，后继位为魏明帝。
description.en: Cao Rui was the son of Cao Pi and Empress Wenzhao Zhen, and later succeeded the throne as Emperor Ming of Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡是文昭甄皇后之子。
description.en: Cao Rui was the son of Empress Wenzhao Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 文昭甄皇后是曹丕的妻妾。
description.en: Empress Wenzhao Zhen was a consort of Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 文昭甄皇后原为袁熙之妻，后被曹丕所纳。
description.en: Empress Wenzhao Zhen was originally the wife of Yuan Xi before being taken by Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕与曹植曾为争夺魏王世子之位而对立，关系紧张。
description.en: Cao Pi and Cao Zhi were rivals for the position of heir to the King of Wei, leading to a tense relationship.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，对曹植备加迫害，多次将其迁徙封地并削夺其权力。
description.en: After becoming emperor, Cao Pi severely persecuted Cao Zhi, frequently relocating his fiefdom and stripping him of power.

description.zh-cn: 因失宠后口出怨言，曹丕于221年六月下令赐死文昭甄皇后。
description.en: After falling out of favor and complaining, Cao Pi ordered Empress Wenzhao Zhen to commit suicide in June 221.

description.zh-cn: 220年，曹丕逼迫汉献帝刘协禅位，结束了东汉王朝。
description.en: In 220, Cao Pi forced Emperor Xian of Han, Liu Xie, to abdicate the throne, ending the Eastern Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕于220年接受汉献帝禅让，建立曹魏，改元黄初。
description.en: In 220, Cao Pi accepted the abdication of Emperor Xian of Han, established the state of Cao Wei, and changed the era name to Huangchu.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕采纳陈群的建议，正式推行九品中正制作为官员选拔制度。
description.en: Cao Pi adopted Chen Qun's suggestion and officially implemented the Nine-rank system for selecting officials.

description.zh-cn: 陈群向曹丕建议并设计了九品中正制。
description.en: Chen Qun proposed and designed the Nine-rank system to Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 九品中正制的实行，使得士族的政治特权得到确立和巩固。
description.en: The implementation of the Nine-rank system established and consolidated the political privileges of the aristocratic clans.

description.zh-cn: 221年，孙权向曹丕称臣，被册封为吴王。后因拒绝送儿子入朝为人质而关系破裂。
description.en: In 221, Sun Quan submitted to Cao Pi as a vassal and was enfeoffed as the King of Wu. The relationship broke down after he refused to send his son to the Wei court as a hostage.

description.zh-cn: 自222年起，在孙权拒绝遣子入质后，曹魏与孙吴走向敌对，曹丕曾三次亲征孙吴。
description.en: Starting in 222, after Sun Quan refused to send his son as a hostage, Cao Wei and Sun Wu became hostile, and Cao Pi personally led three campaigns against Sun Wu.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕发动了三次伐吴战争，意图征服孙吴。
description.en: Cao Pi launched three campaigns against Wu with the intention of conquering Sun Wu.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕的三次伐吴军事行动均以失败告终，未能达成战略目标。
description.en: All three of Cao Pi's military campaigns against Wu ended in failure, failing to achieve their strategic objectives.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，因记恨早年曹洪拒绝借钱，便找借口将曹洪下狱，并没收其财产。
description.en: After becoming emperor, Cao Pi, holding a grudge against Cao Hong for refusing a loan in their youth, found an excuse to imprison him and confiscate his property.

description.zh-cn: 因鲍勋为人刚正，多次劝谏曹丕，触怒了曹丕，最终被曹丕找借口处死。
description.en: Because of his upright character and repeated admonitions, Bao Xun angered Cao Pi and was eventually executed by him on a pretext.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕撰写了《典论》。
description.en: Cao Pi authored the 'Dianlun'.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕于187年冬天出生于沛国谯县。
description.en: Cao Pi was born in Qiao County, Pei Principality, in the winter of 187.
